com.nalinstudios.iscan.internal

Class Statics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nalinstudios.iscan.internal.Statics

  • public class Statics
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to store all simple functions used by other files in this application.
    Author:
    Nalin Angrish.

      • createPdf

        public static void createPdf(android.app.Application app,
                             java.lang.String name)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        A function to create a PDF from all the Imaged captured in the current session.
        Parameters:
        app - The application object to get the current session.
        name - The name of the PDF to store as.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the PDF could not be written and stored.
        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException - Thrown if the Document could not be created,
